Package gw.api.importing

Interface ImportingUtilHelper

public interface ImportingUtilHelper
An instance of this class is passed to import to give a finer granularity for the import. Date: Apr 4, 2011 Time: 5:32:45 PM

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    boolean
    duplicateIsOkay(KeyableBean bean)
    Return true if this bean, which was also in the import, is okay to use.

    This will determine if the retained entity type should also be excluded from reference entities.

  • Method Details

    • duplicateIsOkay

      boolean duplicateIsOkay(KeyableBean bean)
      Return true if this bean, which was also in the import, is okay to use.
      Parameters:
      bean - the bean found in the database
      Returns:
      true if okay to use

    • findEntityById

      default Optional<KeyableBean> findEntityById(IEntityType entityType, String publicId)
      Return a bean for this public id or Optional.empty() if the bean not found. If this returns null this will use the public id finder.
      Parameters:
      entityType - the entityType to fine
      publicId - the public id to find
      Returns:
      return a bean for this public id.

    • overrideDatabase

      boolean overrideDatabase(KeyableBean bean)
      Return true if this bean, should have it's fields in the database replaced by the attributes in the input stream.
      Parameters:
      bean - the bean found in the database
      Returns:
      return true if the import fields should override the database fields

    • getEffDatedBranchContext

      EffDatedBranch getEffDatedBranchContext()
      EffDated entities need to be created with their EffDatedBranch. This should return the EffDatedBranch. Note that this limits the restore to one EffDateBranch per import.
      Returns:
      the EffDatedBranch for this restore.

    • setIdOnBean

      void setIdOnBean(KeyableBean bean, String dbId)
      Set id on bean
      Parameters:
      bean - the bean found in the database

      Parameters:

      Returns:
      if exclude

      Returns:
      turn if the virtual link should be processed

    • handleTypeCodeNotFound

      default void handleTypeCodeNotFound(String typeKeyCode, String typelist)
